Name: Sarna March Militia
Details: The Sarna March Militia forces are the last line of defense for the Sarna March.  Most of the Sarna March Militia units were destroyed during Operation Guerrero in 3057. The surviving Achernar and Nanking March commands were placed under the command of Capellan March Militia and eventually folded into that unit.  Each militia RCT consisted of a BattleMech regiment, five regiments of infantry, two armor regiments, and a wings of aerospace fighters.
